snippet.title: Blocks for Babies Announcement Trailer - Steam
snippet.description:
Blocks for Babies is a tetromino-dropping roguelite FPS where you jump between 2D and 3D to shoot and shape your board. Clear lines, earn upgrades, and slay demons in this genre-bending freak show, coming soon to PC.

Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2776770/Blocks_for_Babies/

Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/jev6BHgMx4
